subject: RE: [junit] Constructor called multiple times?
msgSnippet: ... I m not sure if this is test runner specific behavior, but in my experience the constructors are all called at the same time, before any tests are run.
messageBody:
> What is the distinction between setup() and the constructor?

I'm not sure if this is test runner specific behavior, but in my
experience the constructors are all called at the same time, before any
tests are run. And then setUp() is run immediately before each test
method is executed. That's with JUnit 3.8. I can't speak for version 4
as we haven't switched yet.


Todd.
